res_img_laws_deepfake.title: Potential Violation: Anti-Cybercrime Act
res_img_laws_deepfake.content: If the images were digitally produced, altered, edited, or doctored, this could be a violation of the Anti-Cybercrime Act.

res_img_laws_safe_spaces.title: Potential Violation: Safe Spaces Act
res_img_laws_safe_spaces.content: If the images or videos in question are humiliating, defamatory, or threatening in nature, this could be a violation of the Safe Spaces Act.

res_img_laws_privacy.title: Potential Violation: Data Privacy Act
res_img_laws_privacy.content: If the images or videos in question are using your identity to impersonate you, this could be a violation of the Data Privacy Act.

res_img_laws_voyeur.title: Potential Violation: Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act
res_img_laws_voyeur.content: If the images or videos in question were obtained secretly or without your consent, this could be a violation of the Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act.

res_img_laws_intimate.title: Potential Violation: Safe Spaces / Voyeurism
res_img_laws_intimate.content: If the images contain intimate or explicit materials, this could be a violation of the Safe Spaces Act, Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act, and other special protections.

res_img_laws_minor.title: Potential Violation: Anti-OSAEC / Anti-Child Abuse
res_img_laws_minor.content: If the images contain minors (children under the age of 18), this could be a violation of the Anti-OSAEC Law, Anti-Child Abuse Law, and you may be entitled to special protections.

res_imp_action.title: Report Impersonation
res_imp_action.content: It sounds like you will need to resolve this directly with the platform or person in question. We can help you prepare a formal complaint based on the information you've provided, or we can help connect you to other resources.

res_imp_action_2.title: Report Impersonation
res_imp_action_2.content: It sounds like you will need to resolve this directly with the platform or person in question. We can help you prepare a formal complaint based on the information you've provided, or we can help connect you to other resources.

res_imp_action_3.title: Report Impersonation
res_imp_action_3.content: It sounds like you will need to resolve this directly with the platform or person in question. We can help you prepare a formal complaint based on the information you've provided, or we can help connect you to other resources.

res_imp_security.title: Secure Your Accounts
res_imp_security.content: If your login information has been exposed, please change your passwords immediately and enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) on all accounts.

res_imp_action_4.title: Report Impersonation
res_imp_action_4.content: It sounds like you will need to resolve this directly with the platform or person in question. We can help you prepare a formal complaint based on the information you've provided, or we can help connect you to other resources.

res_imp_security_2.title: Secure Your Accounts
res_imp_security_2.content: If your login information has been exposed, please change your passwords immediately and enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) on all accounts.

res_harass_cyber.title: Potential Violation: Anti-Cybercrime Act
res_harass_cyber.content: The harassment/threats involve repeated and unwanted contact through digital means. This could be a violation of the Anti-Cybercrime Act.

res_harass_threats.title: Potential Violation: Grave Threats (Article 282)
res_harass_threats.content: If the harassment involves threats of physical, reputational, or financial harm, this could be a violation of Article 282 (Grave Threats).

res_harass_safe_spaces.title: Potential Violation: Safe Spaces Act
res_harass_safe_spaces.content: If the harassment is directed to a woman and/or child, this could be a violation of the Safe Spaces Act.

res_harass_vawc.title: Potential Violation: Anti-VAWC Laws
res_harass_vawc.content: If the harassment is coming from a current or former intimate partner, this could be a violation of Anti-VAWC Laws (RA 9262).

res_imp_action_5.content: It sounds like you will need to resolve this directly with the platform or person in question. We can help you prepare a formal complaint based on the information you've provided, or we can help connect you to other resources.

res_dox_npc.title: Data Privacy Violation
res_dox_npc.content: It sounds like what you're experiencing could be a violation of the Data Privacy Act (RA 10173). We can help you draft a formal complaint.

res_dox_offline.title: Offline/Other Violation
res_dox_offline.content: If this didn't happen via a computer system, it might not be a Data Privacy Act violation, but could still be illegal. Consult legal counsel.
